#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int test;
	cin>>test;
//	int position=0;
	while(test--)
	{
	  int n, position=0;
	  
	  cin>>n;
	  pair<string,int> feed[n];
	  while(n--)
	  {
	  string local;
	  char x;
	  cin>>local>>x;
	  int i=0;
	  while(i<position)
	  {
	    if(feed[i].first==local)
	    {
	      position--;
	      break;
	    }
	    i++;
	  }
	  feed[i].first=local;
	  if(x=='+')
	  feed[i].second=1;
	  else
	  feed[i].second=-1;
	  position++;
	  }
	  int sum=0;
	  for(int j=0;j<position;j++)
	  {
	  sum+=feed[j].second;
	  }
	  cout<<sum<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
